name: Diffusion Phenomena
description:
This game was developed by the UE4 game engine, ready

for PC and mobile platforms. It is a level mode game that

including multiple individual levels. Players need to complete

each level’s objectives to achieve the challenge for each level.

The game is designed to increase awareness of COVID virus

prevention by focusing on droplet transmission, the most

widespread mode of transmission of the virus. People are

encouraged to keep a social distance and wear masks. To

make the game experience more immersive, several typical

life scenes were selected as the game scenes, such as restaurants,

bars and classrooms.

To let the player have a deeper understanding of the process

and ways of virus transmission, let the player stand in the

virus’s perspective to play the virus. The victory goal of the

player is to infect all the human in the scene. The player can

do two things:

• Select and infect a single human.

• Maks all infected human to cough to spread virus.
